methods.name: vertexDoubleClicked
methods.comment: Called when a vertex is double-clicked

params.name: mouseInfo
params.comment:
the info object that contains mouse information for the graph and 
        the low-level vertex's clicked component

return.comment: true if this call wants to stop all further mouse event processing

name: VertexClickListener
comment:
A listener that allows clients to be notified of vertex clicks.  Normal 
 mouse processing is handled by the VisualGraphMousePlugin class.  This is a
 convenience method so that clients do not have to deal with the mouse plugin.
